lines: amit va priya veena se vida lekar laut aae
veena ne chalate hue yahee kaha tha dev kee barasee ke baad tum donon ka byaah racha loon yahee meree ichchha hai
shesh sab baad mein sochenge
ekaek amit ko laga ki shaayad abhee bhee veena apanee soch ko kuchh samay dena chaahatee hai shaayad
lekin usamen kuchh to badalaav aa hee gaya tha
veena ke shabdon mein haan thee yahee bhaav samete ve ghar laut aae
amit to maan nirmala ka dulaara ban gaya
kaise hoga kaun dhoondhega sab amit par chhod diya maan ne
lekin amit ko apane maanbaap ka bhee dar tha
bhaeeyon ka bhee
ve sab to baaten banaenge
isee duvidha mein pada amit agale chhah maheene kuchh na kar saka
apanee priya kee shaadee kee chinta bhee use satae ja rahee thee
jo maadhyam tha usaka vah svayan duhkhon ke pahaad ko uthaaye jee raha tha
kisase kahata
kaun usakee sahaayata kar sakata tha
ek chiraag tha usake paas prem
haan vahee vah spashtavaadee tha
paristhitiyon ko bevajah milaajula kar nae aayaam nahin sthaapit karane vaala
kisee kee jindagee mein jo kuchh ghatit hua hai usaka doshee samaaj ko ya kisee parivaar ke doosare sadasy ko na maanane vaala
lekin jo kahana hai bejhijhak kahane ko tatpar
prem yoonit se laut raha tha
ghar jaate hue usakee tren jab dillee pahunchee to amit steshan par usase milane pahunch gaya
prem ko use dekhakar aashchary hua
saamane khade amit ko usake man ko samajhata bhee tha
ekadoosare se ve gale mile
bahut achchha laga kisee apane ko chhah maheene baad milakar
prem ne usake haath ko pakade hue kaha tumhen kisane bataaya tha
priya kee chitthee aatee hai
usee ne likha tha
amit ne kaha
jaise sanket diya ki priya aur usak sambadh kaayam hai
abhee prem apanee koee pratikriya deta amit ne punah kaha pichhale maheene main deharaadoon gaya tha
mammee ne bhee kaha tha ki tum aa rahe ho
bahut achchha laga amit tumase milakar
prem ko amit achchha lagata tha pahale se
aur kya chal raha hai kaam kaisa hain ghar mein sab kaise hain prem ke shabd ek saath bane aur nikalane lage
sabhee achchhe hain
kaam bhee achchha hai aur jo duhkh hai usase hamatum sabhee vaakiph hain
amit kuchh kahane se pahale svayan ko taiyaar kar raha tha
samay sab theek kar dega
haan samay sab theek hee karega
main veena bhaabhee se mila tha
mammee ne likha hoga tumhen poochha amit ne
likha tha sab
mujhe to achchha hee laga sunakar ke deedee maan gaee hain
lekin koee usake yogy milega tabhee yah ho paega
har kisee ko to yah rishta raas nahin aaega
prem ke shabd spasht the dard bhee tha unamen
haan har kisee ko nahin raas aaega
maine akhabaar mein vigyaapan dene kee sochee hai
apane man kee baat kahee amit ne lekin main ghar mein chitthee nahee mangava pa raha tha
ab tum aa gae ho deharaadoon ke pate se de doonga
tum ise sambhaal lena
shukriya amit
main tumhaaree bhaavanaon kee kadr karata hoon
mujhe pata hai ki dil se tum chaahate ho ki deedee ka ghar bas jae
vah bhaavuk ho chala tha lekin shabd spasht the haan ek baat hai tumhaare lie tumhaare ghar mein toophaan khada na ho jae
nahee aisee baat nahee hai
sirph maan rudhivaadee hain
vahee kabheekabhee dabe munh puraatan baaten kah jaatee hain
lekin phir bhee jaanata hoon ek hee baat jeevan veena bhaabhee ka hai jeena unhonne use apane lie hai
usamen maan kee baat yadi dakiyaanoosee hain to mujhe use nahin sunana
samay sabhee baaten sabhee rup badal deta hai
amit bhee man mein aaee har baat usase kah raha tha
haan theek hai
lekin tumhaaree mammee ko bhee samajhana chahie
abhee priya aaegee tumhaare ghar
aisa nahee ki tum use kuchh kasht hone doge
lekin ek baat to siddh hai ki kaheen na kaheen use veena ke punah vivaah par kuchh na kuchh to sunana hoga
amit ko prem ke shabd sunakar jaise man maangee muraad mil gaee
usane to socha bhee na tha ki prem ke shabd usake va priya ke sambandhon ke prati itanee jaldee vaaky gadh lenge
dekho prem mai sabhee ke prati apane kartavy ko nibhaata aaya hoon

ghar mein sabase chhota hoon lekin jeevan mein abhee tak itana dekh chuka hoon ki kisee kee vyarth kee baat kisee ka vyarth ka hath mujhe nahin jhuka sakata aur mai pyaar se sab kuchh deta hoon to mujhe apane adhikaar bhee maaloom hain
apane adhikaar kshen mein mera jeevan hai
meree apanee dhaaranaen hain
main apane raaste se apanee raay se itanee jaldee munh nahin mod paata
amit ke shabd prem ke bahut gahare man ko chhoo gae
achchha lagata hai tabhee baat karake tumase mere chhote jeeja jee
aur prem ne use gale laga liya
main chhuttee aaya hoon iseelie ki mammee ne mujhase kaha hai ki amit bheetar se bahut pareshaan hai
use ab priya se vivaah karana hai
priya se vivaah kee socho aur phir tum donon mil kar veena deedee ke lie ek ladaka dhoondh lena
ekaek baat ka pravaah itana meetha mod lega amit ko isakee aasha nahin thee
bhaavuk hokar vah bola prem se mammee to mere man kee baat samajhatee hain
lekin main hee duvidha mein pada tha
tab prem ekaek vichaaramagn ho gaya
kuchh thahar kar bola amit kuchh baaten main spasht hokar kahana chaahata hoon tumhen
inhen anyatha na lena
blaki tum usaka hissa bhee ho
priya se shaadee karake ho sakata hai tumhen kisee na kisee se anyath baat sunane ko mile ya tumhen kaheen apamaan bhee mahasoos ho
main samajhata hoon maan samajhatee hai mere sabhee parivaar vaale samajhate hai
par parivaar ke har sadasy ka apana bhee parivaar hai unhen kuchh kahana hoga to ve avashy kahenge
saamane na sahee peechhe se
aise mein tumhen sabakee manahsthiti ko sahana hoga
doosare shaadee jaldee ho isaka mujhe etaraaj nahin hai
haan ek baat hai shaadee bilkul saadagee se hogee
na baind na baaja na baraatee
bas tum aur tumhaare parivaar vaale
aur koee dhoomadhadaaka nahin
ham sabhee rasmen ada na kar paen is par tumhaare parivaar vaale koee baat nahin banaenge
priya khush rahegee yah main jaanata hoon
usaka maanapamaan bhee mere daayare mein nahin tumhaare daayare mein aata hai
bas yahee chaahata hoon ki tum mere parivaar ke saath ho aur ham bhee tumhaare saath hain
prem apanee baat kah chuka to amit ne gambheerata se kaha dekho prem main svayan sabhee paristhitiyon ko samajhata hoon
mujhe vaise bhee shorasharaaba tabhee achchha lagata hai jab man se usakee aavaaj aa rahee ho
jahaan tak lenaden ya rasmonrivaaj kee baat hai usaka na lobh mujhamen hai aur na hee koee lobh mere samaksh dikha sakata hai
priya mere lie hee aa rahee hai mere ghar mein aur use poora maanasammaan mile isakee mujhe bhee chinta hai
apanee jindagee ko mujhe apanee tarah jeene ka adhikaar hai aur usake lie mai apane ko taiyaar kar chuka hoon
haan kuchh kasht aaenge main bhee jaanata hoon aur isake lie main kya karunga priya kya karegee yah tum ham donon par hee chhod do
yadi tumhen apane manobhaavon par vishvaas hai to maano main bhee vaisa hee hoon jaisa tumhaara man maanata hai
amit ke shabd prem ke man ko chhoo gae
usakee deharaadoon jaane vaale tren ka samay ho gaya tha
amit ko gale lagata tab vah bola sab theek ho jaega amit
tum mammeedaidee se milakar taareekh tay kar lo
main bhee vaheen hounga
agale ek maheene mein sab kuchh ho jaega
theek hai main kisee bhee din aa jaunga
yahaan sabako bata kar
aur veena bhaabhee kee chinta ko tum na akele the na akela svayan ko paoge
ab vah meree bhaabhee nahin deedee hain
yah kahakar amit ne prem se vida lee
priya ke prati nae sapane use sanjone the aur apane ghar mein sab kuchh theek karana tha
maan krashna ke man mein jhijhak thee
khulakar vah kuchh na bol paayee
amit ab jaldee shaadee karana chaah raha hai priya se yah sunakar vah tatasth bhaav se itana hee bolee main kya kahoon yah maan ka ek rataahua vaaky tha
kyon kuchh galat hoga kya amit ko maan kee baat atapatee lagee
maan to bahut khush hogee aisa socha tha usane
apane bhaeeyon kee shaadee mein vah badhachadh kar khushee manaata raha
maan hamesha khushee se dekhatee thee use
yahee kahatee thee tab dekhana apanee shaadee mein bhee bahut naachega amit
main kyon sabhee naachenge
bhaeebhaabheetum bhee baaboojee bhee
sabase chhota hoon lekin khushee to sabase badee hogee ghar bhar kee
amit kee baat sunakar sabhee hansate the
aur aaj jise sunakar sabase jyaada khush hona chaahie tha vahee main kya kahoon
kahakar tatasth see ho gaee man bujh gaya usaka
sochane laga man hee man kyon kya koee gunaah hai yah ek ghar se doosaree ladakee laana haan gunaah yadi hua hai to jaaneanajaane hamase hua hai
ham jimmedaar hai
ham gunaahagaar hai veena ke ham karjadaar hai veena ke usake parivaar vaalon ke
na to ve log karate
thukara dete meree chaahat ke rishte ko
lekin unaka badappan dekho mere pyaar ko meree chaahat ko veena ke durbhaagy se nahee tol rahe
ve usee kee kismat ka khel maanakar meree aur priya kee raah mein roda nahin ataka rahe
amit jabajab aisa sochata tha bhaavanaon mein bahakar baal kee khaal naunchane lagata tha chup rah na paata tha
lagata hai tum khush nahin huee sunakar meree shaadee kee baat
amit ne dubaara prashn kar daala maan se
mai to har haal mein khush hoon
maan ke munh se phir vahee tatasth javaab nikala
mera bhaagy dekho apanee shaadee kee baat svayan chalaanee pad rahee hai
us par tum do shabd ghumaaphira kar dohara rahee ho
amit shaayad maan ke man se kuchh kahalavaana chaah raha tha apanee khushee ke shabd
lekin maan thee ki soch ka daayara bahut sankuchit tha usaka
duhkh kee jyaada chinta thee
kaun kahaan duhkhee hai isakee thaah nahin rakhatee vah
bas vah svayan duhkhee hai usaka javaan beta chala gaya
abhee varsh bhee nahin beeta bahoo ghar se nikal kar maayake chalee gaee hai mera duhkh baantane kee bajaay maayake chalee gaee hai
mere bete kee yaad bhee thukara gaee
maan kee yahee baaten kachotatee hain
maan ke munh se nikal hee gaya aakhir tumhen shaadee kee padee hai
mera duhkh abhee khatm bhee nahin hua varsh abhee beeta nahin aur ghar mein shaadee kee baat shuru ho gaee
mera javaan beta chala gaya
aur maan rone lagee
bahut achchhee baat kar rahee ho maan
duhkh tumhen hee hai kya hamen nahee hua kuchh aur apanee jindagee kee gaadee sadak ke kinaare khadee kar de kya aavesh mein usaka chehara tamatamaane laga tha
main yah kab kahana chaah rahee hoon
use dekho mere paas baithakar mera duhkh baantane kee bajaay maayake ja kar baith gaee
maan ke mukh se nikal hee gaya aakhirakaar
amit tab phoot pada vaah maan vaah tumhaara duhkh kisee se chhipa nahin hai
lekin veena ka duhkh sabase chhipa rahata hai
sab samajhate hai veena maayake chalee gaee
usaka duhkh samaapt ho gaya
jaise philm mein rol ada karane aaee thee vah
rol khatm duhkh khatm
usake duhkh kee seema tum kya samajho maan
aur use jara bhee dosh mat dena
usaka kiya maintum ham sab saat janm bhee nahin utaar sakate
basabas rahane do
tum to usakee hee baat karoge
ab to tumhen usakee har baat hee theek lagegee
bas phir kya tha amit aape se baahar ho gaya
aavaaj unchee ho gaee usakee
shaayad apanee baat kahane ke lie shabd kam the ya ki man hee man itana ghuta hua tha ki shabdon ka aaveg tham hee na paaya
haan aaj tum yahee kahogee maan apane man ke chor ko chhipaane ka bada aasaan raasta hai yah

hamane kya kiya usake saath kabhee socha hai dev se shaadee huee vah vidhava ho gaee dekhatedekhate usake duhkh kee koee seema nahin vah vidhava ban kar tumhaare paas baithee rotee rahe saaree jindagee
kaun se janm ka karj hai jo tumhaare prati chukae shaadee karake jis din aaee thee ulate paanv laut jaatee to shaayad main bhee kahata usane apanee bhaavanaon ko sahee samajha
ek pativrata ban gaee thee vah
dinaraat tumhaare bete kee seva karatee rahee usaka inaam tum yah de rahee ho saat janm usakee pooja karo to shaayad utar naeen paega yah rn
dekh lena maan tum ham sabhee kaheen na kaheen kabhee na kabhee bhugatenge usakee is chot ko
amit kee aavaaj itanee unchee thee ki baaboojee bhee vahaan aa gae
baaboojee ko kuchh pata to tha nahin baat ka amit ko uncha bolate dekhakar usase kyon chilla kar bol rahe ho maan se dheeme baat nahee hotee kya
kaise boloon dheeme
yah sunatee nahee hai
samajhatee nahin hai
apana rona rotee hai
ek hee baat ko har jagah phit kar detee hai
mujhe kya pata mera duhkh dekhe koee amit thoda aavaaj neechee kar chuka tha
amit ko pita se dhaadhas kee aasha thee
vah sab samajh gae
amit kee baat sunakar
bole ye to paagal hai
veena ka to karj hai ham par
apanee bhaabhee se bhee baat kar
main gupta saahab ko chitthee likh doonga
ab barasee ko chand din hee rah gae hai
shaadee kar lo tum yadi vah khushee se maanate hai
hamen teree khushee kee paravaah hai beta
aur unakee betee to hamaaree betee hai
tumane usake saath jeevan jo bitaana hai
jo karo soch samajh kar karo
aur yah sunakar amit ka aavesh tham gaya
toophaan jo main kya kahoon vaaky se khada hua tha ekaek tham gaya
aur maan krashna bhee dekho ekaek chup ho gaee
aansoo ponchhate hue bolee mujhe bhee to priya achchhee lagatee hai
mainne na to nahin kee thee bas apane duhkh kee baat kee thee
kabhee sukh ko chaahakar bhee jeene kee koshish karo
iseelie kahata hoon subahashaam bhagavaan ka dhyaan karo
poojaapaath karo
bhajanakeertan mein jaaya karo
sabake duhkh ek samaan lagenge
duhkhon ko dekhogee to sabhee duhkhee lagenge
sukh kee chaah karogee to duhkh sabhee baune pad jaenge usake saamane
pita shreeraam kee baat amit ke antahkaran ko chhoo gaee
vah usake man ko pahachaanate the
aap mujhe gupta jee ke naam chitthee likh do main svayan deharaadoon jaakar sab tay kar aaunga
amit ne tab kaha
theek hai
shaam ko le lena
ab jao munhahaath dho lo aur gussa shaant karo
pita shreeraam samajhate the amit ke man ko use shaant karana bahut aasaan tha
amit ke jeevan mein bahaar aa gaee
dev kee barasee ke baad das hee din mein sabhee taiyaaree ho gaee
amit kee shaadee ho gaee priya se
deharaadoon se dillee kee dooree jaise khatm ho gaee thee amit ke lie
din ke samay phere hue
baaraatee ke naam par ghar ke log aur amit ke do min the
veena vahee se aakar parivaar ke saath mil gaee
na koee baind na baja
saadagee se vivaah sampann ho gaya
priya ko saath lekar sab der raat gae dillee laut aae
jeevan ka sabase madhur sapana amit ka poora ho gaya
priya jisake naam kee maala vah har dam japata tha aaj usake jeevan mein naene sapane jodane ko aakar mil gaee
aaj amit sirph amit nahee rah gaya
aaj amit ke naam ke saath priya ka naam bhee jud gaya
sapanon ko saakaar karane mein jut gaya amit
ek maheena to ghoomane mein lag gaya
vah kashmeer bhee gaya shimala bhee gaya aur na jaane kahaankahaan
priya ke man mein aaee har baat ko poora karane mein hee juta rahata
shaadee ko hue chhah maheene beet gae aur amitapriya ko lagata tha jaise abhee kuchh samay hee nahin hua hai
nity nae premaprasang hote tab ek hee baat priya doharaatee amit tum mujhe pahale kyon nahin mile amit sunata aur yahee kahata priya tumane mere jeevan ko naee disha dee hain
yah jeevan tumhaara saath paakar saarthak ho gaya hai
yah sukh tumhaare saath ka itana shundar hoga aisa to main dherasee kalpanaen karake bhee nahin jaan paaya
sukh ke sau din aur duhkh ka ek din ek samaan beetane lagate hain
deharaadoon gae to maan nirmala ne baaton hee baaton mein kah diya amit se beta veena ke lie kuchh socho
palapal yah yug samaan beetata prateet ho raha hai
amit ko tab apanee bhool ka ehasaas ho gaya tha
vah sapanon kee duniyaan se apanee dharatee par laut aaya
usane dekha door veena akelee baithee aasapaas ke taare gin rahee hai
ekadoteen anaginat taare usakee ginatee na rukatee hai na khatm aane ko hotee hai
antaheen samay veena ke lie
main kal hee dillee laut kar vigyaapan doonga mammee aap chinta na karo
amit ne unhen dilaasa diya
jaisa theek lage beta vahee karo
prem to baarabaar chhuttee nahin aa sakata
prem ka daayitv tumhen hee nibhaana hai
aur jaise unhen kuchh yaad aaya bolee ek rishta to mere paas aaya tha
main na haan kar sakee na na
kaun tha mammee amit utsuk ho utha
jinase hamane yah makaan khareeda tha unaka beta misej tandan chal kar aaee thee
unaka beta phauj mein karnal hai
veena se umr mein das varsh bada
umr kee baat to phir bhee chal sakatee hai lekin usaka apana beta hai ekasolah varsh ka
yahaan doon skool mein padata hai
teen saal ho gae hai usakee patnee ka dehaant hue
veena ko ishaare se kaha tha vah chup rahee
baad mein daidee jee ne baat aage badaane se spasht inkaar kar diya tha
itana bada beta ho jisaka usase kaise vivaah kar den maine to ladaka dekha tha kya gabaru javaan lagata hee nahin ki itane bade bete ka baap hai
par man nahin maanata baat aage badhaane ko kuchh rukee maan phir bolee misej tandan ne to doteen baar jikr kiya hai lekin main hee chup hoon
amit kuchh kahata usase pahale priya bol padee nahin mammee is baat ko yaheen samaapt kar den
shaadee ka matalab yah nahin ki jo bhee aae use haan kar den
ek adhed umr ke vyakti se to shaadee nahin kar sakate
aur phir itana bada beta
deedee ke lie aise var mujhe nahee janchate
ham to chaahate hain
deedee ko aisa var mile jo umar mein chaahe thodaabada ho par jisase bandh kar vah apane parivaar kee soche
kuchh ruk kar phir se bolee ab aaen misej tandan to saaph mana kar dena
aise ke lie dubaara deedee se poochhana bhee mat kaheen phir bhadak gaee to dubaara nahin maanengee
maan bhee priya kee baat se sahamat hote hue bolee tum theek kahatee ho priya main saaph mana kar doongee
agale din priya va amit dillee laut gae aur amit ne jaate hee vigyaapan de diya veena kee punah shaadee ka
das din baad hee daak se dher se pan aa gae
maan krashna ko pata chal gaya
panon ka aashay samajh kar usane aasamaan ek kar diya
mere ghar mein yah sab nahin chalega
jis ghar se mere bete kee arthee uthee us ghar mein usakee bahoo kee dolee ka saamaan nahin taiyaar ho sakata aavesh mein bol gaee thee maan
amit ko is baat ka aabhaas pahale se hee tha
maan ko samajhaane ke lie vah pahale se hee taiyaar tha
usake aavesh ko shaant karana jaruree tha
priya se shaadee nahee huee thee tab baat aur thee
ab use apane saathasaath priya ke manobhaavon ka bhee khyaal rakhana tha
maan kee baat priya ko anyatha na lage use is baat kee bhee chinta thee
usake aavesh ko dekhakar vah bola maan tum aisee baat karane se pahale kuchh socho jara
jo nahee raha usaka duhkh tumhen hai mujhe bhee hai aur ham sabhee ko hai
lekin jara socho
jara apanee bhaavanaon mein veena ko bhee jagah do
vah kisake sahaare jee rahee hai abhee to sab hai
lekin kuchh samay baad sab apaneeapanee jindagee mein vyast ho jaenge
hamaare ghar ko dekho kise padee hai usakee mohan bhaee saahab apane parivaar mein mast hain
ramesh bhaee bhee sab bhoole apane parivaar ke saath kabheekabhaar mujhe likh dete hai ki veena ke lie kya socha isake alaava unake paas bhee koee shabd nahee hai
vah kuchh pal ke lie thahara
maan ke paas shabd nahee the usakee baaton ke
pita shreeraam apana raamaayanapaath chhod kar usakee hee baat sun rahe the

vah bolane laga aage kya yah umr hai bhaabhee kee ghar mein yoon baithane kee kya maala jap kar saaree jindagee bitaee ja sakatee hai hamaara pharj to hai ki vah chaahe ya phir use hamen manaana pade hamen usaka parivaar basaane ke lie poora jor lagaana chaahie
sab kuchh to usane apana nyauchhaavar kar diya tha hamaare parivaar par
kitanee khush thee vah dev se vivaah karake usakee seva dekhakar bhee bhagavaan ne usakee pukaar nahee sunee
vah to har pal dev kee mangalakaamana karatee rahee
ab bhee vah dev ko nahee bhoolee
na hee vah use kabhee bhool paegee
lekin main to yahee maanata hoon aur mera yah kartavy bhee hai ki main usake lie kuchh naya karane kee sochoon
yahee hamaara praayashchit hai usake prati
aur meree maano to tum bhee khusheekhushee usake lie koee achchha ladaka dhoondhane kee koshish karo
maan chup rahee
aansoo bahane lage usakee aankhon se
bete ka pyaar to tha hee man mein bahoo ke lie vah pyaar nahee pa rahee thee apane man mein ki jhat se haan kar detee
lekin amit ke shabdon ka virodh karane kee kshamata bhee nahee thee
jaisee jisakee soch hotee hai usase adhik to socha nahee ja sakata
ek saamaajik parampara ke viruddh jaana itana saral to nahin
lekin shabd kaee baar saara raasta rok lete hain
ham chaahakar bhee kuchh nahee kar sakate
veena ka sochatee maan krashna to amit kee baaton ka koee utar nahee tha usake paas
dev ke prati apane pyaar ko amit ke shabd kam to nahee kar rahe the lekin veena ke prati use usake kartavy ka ehasaas to karava hee rahe the
tab itana hee kah paee jo kuchh karana ho karo tum
lekin mujhase kuchh na poochho
mujhe kuchh na batao
main tumhaara saath nahee de paungee
amit samajh gaya usakee bhaavana ko
aur yahee thaan liya usane ki aage se vah kabhee bhee veena ke sambandh mein usase koee baat nahin karega
kuchh der baad pita shreeraam usake kamare mein chale aae the
priya va amit ko sambodhit karate hue unhonne yahee kaha tha beta apanee maan kee baat ka bura nahee maanana
vah dev kee yaad se baahar nahin nikal paegee
tum jo kar rahe ho eeshvar tumhaara saath dega
usaka parivaar bas jae meree yahee praarthana hai
haan vah jaisa chaahatee hai vaisa karane mein koee harj nahin
maan ke lie apanee santaan se upar koee nahee hota aur vah dev se aage abhee kuchh nahee soch paegee
aise mein jo karo use usakee khabar na lagane do
vakt svayan usako samajha dega
aur phir yahee hua
amit pan aate hee kamara band karake priya ke saath unakee chhantanee karata aur ekek karake javaab bhej deta
lekin yah kaam itana aasaan nahin lag raha tha
ek vidhava ka naam jud gaya tha veena ke naam ke aage
aise mein uchit var kee talaash tedhee kheer lag rahee thee use
